definition: a hidden trouble hard to mention (idiom)/sth too embarrassing to mention/an embarrassing illness

to empathize/to allow (for sth)/to show understanding/to appreciate

to ponder earnestly/to give a lot of thought to sth
to have no other choice/to be the last resort
